name: Choice List Placement Plugin for RPG Maker MV
name_original: Choice List Placement Plugin for RPG Maker MV
description:
1.INTRODUCTION :

Allows the developer to change the position of the choices box when a certain game switch is active.

Features

This plugin allows us to do the following features without the need for any plugin command or any additional effort from the game's developer:

  • Change the choice list position during the game;
  • Reset to the default position at any time.

1.HOW TO USE:

This plugin allows the developer to change the position of the choices box when a certain game switch is active. This switch id is chosen on the first plugin's parameter and can be turned off at any time during the game to reset the choices window's position.

The position itself is set on two game variables. These variable Ids are chosen on the second (x postion) and third (y position) plugin's parameters. These variables' value can be updated at any time during the game to update the new position for the choices list.

 VERY IMPORTANT NOTE: The variable and switch ids must exist on the database for this plugin to work.
